programme.title: Brother's Body
programme.desc: Quando decide (voltar a) mergulhar no mundo do culturismo, David Nicolas Parel ambiciona seguir nas pisadas do seu irmão mais novo e treinar para o Arnold Classic – uma competição que deve o nome ao célebre ator e político austríaco-americano.

programme.title: River Memories
programme.desc: Uma comunidade está prestes a desaparecer. Os habitantes de Platz, um enorme bairro de lata em Turim, Itália, defrontam-se com um plano imposto pelo governo e veem-se ameaçados pelo despejo. Este filme documenta os últimos meses do bairro.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Carmen Arce, "Kubalita", guarda-redes da primeira seleção nacional feminina espanhola, parte de Valencia para Barcelona para conhecer Alexia Putellas, vencedora da Liga dos Campeões da UEFA e da Supertaça Europeia, e Viktoria Adrianova, ambas jogadoras do FC Barcelona. Antes do encontro, Alexia confessa não ser tão impaciente como outrora, Viky emociona-se ao recordar a sua lesão e Kubalita afirma que elas não se esconderam, apesar de os políticos e os meios de comunicação terem subestimado a sua atividade. Assim que se reuniram, trocaram impressões sobre o momento atual do futebol feminino.

programme.title: Barcelona: Surf Destination
programme.desc: Em "Barcelona: Surf Destination", Ítalo Ferreira, o primeiro campeão olímpico de surf, aceita o convite do seu amigo Alex Vilalta e viaja para Barcelona para explorar a costa catalã e conhecer a comunidade de surfistas que mantém o espírito do surf aceso neste reduto mediterrâneo. Neste documentário de aventuras repletas de sol, somos convidados a partir numas férias com amigos que se reúnem para tagarelar e entregar-se àquilo que os apaixona: o surf.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: Bojan, por trás do sorriso
programme.desc: Depois de retirar-se dos relvados aos 32 anos, Bojan Krkic decide contar a sua história. Através de uma conversa com o psicanalista que o tratou quando da sua estreia com o FC Barcelona aos 16 anos, o documentário explora as dificuldades enfrentadas por um talento precoce e sensível no mundo cruel do futebol. Jogadores que testemunharam a sua carreira de perto, tais como Thierry Henry, Andrés Iniesta e Zlatan Ibrahimovic, partilham o seu ponto de vista sobre Bojan, o futebolista, e Bojan, a pessoa, e refletem sobre a pressão, saúde mental e gestão de expetativas.

programme.title: A minha Decisão, por Andrés Iniesta
programme.desc: "São poucas as pessoas que sabem o que aconteceu quando me lesionei. Poucas sabem que tive de tomar uma decisão de enorme importância. Valia a pena continuar a jogar, ou estava na altura de parar?" Um documentário revelador sobre o lendário médio, Andrés Iniesta, quando enfrenta uma decisão crucial após uma lesão que ameaça a sua carreira. A história de um amor de longa data pelo futebol, sob a ameaça de uma situação cruel e inevitável.

programme.title: The Peddler
programme.desc: Daniel Burmeister, um cinéfilo de barbas, viaja de terra em terra a realizar filmes de muito baixo orçamento com os autóctones, e em tempo recorde!

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 5-6
programme.desc: Episódio 5 - La Palma | Episódio 6 - El Hierro and La Gomera

programme.title: Finding Hope Home
programme.desc: Os cineastas Wambui Ndegwa e Cole Lewis tornam a realidade queniana visível através da história de uma família que começou a adotar crianças sem-abrigo no Nairobi em 1996.

programme.title: SEVE - Artista, Lutador, Lenda
programme.desc: Seve continua a ser uma lenda, um campeão multi-major, o homem responsável por fazer da moderna Ryder Cup um grande acontecimento. A sua paixão pelo golfe era tal que ainda criança esgueirava no campo para jogar à noite, futuramente faria o mesmo num esforço "para encontrar a magia". A sua história é contada por membros da sua família e do seu círculo interno, por outros grandes desportistas e através do material recentemente descoberto. É um conto hipnotizante de talento, crença e bravura - a história da vida de Seve… e da sua morte.

programme.title: Break Point: a Davis Cup Story
programme.desc: Liderada por Rafa Nadal, a seleção espanhola era a favorita deste ano até sofrer um sério revés. O jogador número dois da equipa, Roberto Bautista, teve de deixar a disputa para voltar à sua cidade natal e ficar ao lado do pai nas últimas horas da sua vida. Sem o Bautista, Nadal e Feliciano López conseguiram heroicamente levar a equipa à final. Mas então veio a notícia que emocionou os fãs de ténis em todo o mundo: Bautista, após o funeral do seu pai, está de volta à competição e pronto para jogar. Unidos mais uma vez, os espanhóis lutam pela vitória na grande final, onde algo muito além do ténis está em jogo.

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 1-2
programme.desc: Episódio 1 - Lanzarote | Episódio 2 - Fuerteventura

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.title: Forgetting Dad
programme.desc: Um homem sofre um pequeno acidente de carro e, uma semana depois, constrói uma nova identidade, alegando que não consegue "lembrar-se" de que é pai. Quase vinte anos depois, a sua amnésia persiste, mas não foram encontrados dano cerebral ou qualquer causa física.

programme.title: Brother's Body
programme.desc: Quando decide (voltar a) mergulhar no mundo do culturismo, David Nicolas Parel ambiciona seguir nas pisadas do seu irmão mais novo e treinar para o Arnold Classic – uma competição que deve o nome ao célebre ator e político austríaco-americano.

programme.title: Episódios 3-4
programme.desc: A maldição | Os Vizinhos

programme.title: Djon Africa
programme.desc: Miguel ouviu dizer que se parece muito com o seu pai, a quem nunca conheceu. Nesta história acompanhamo-lo numa busca poética por esse homem desconhecido entre as memórias e mitologias africanas.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 5 - 6
programme.desc: Nem sempre é fácil agradar os clientes, mas os participantes não podem desiludir. Irão indicar os seus modelos e descobrir o que querem, para concretizarem os seus desejos na máxima medida possível. A atriz, modelo e celebridade televisiva e Christine Quinn irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas de cuidados capilares com os participantes. No segundo desafio, os participantes irão trabalhar com modelos e dedicar-se à pintura de cabelo. Cada visual pode destacar a beleza natural da modelo, ao mesmo tempo que alimenta os seus cabelos, dado que as tintas podem ser prejudiciais.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - T2: Lanzarote | Fuerteventura | Gran Canaria
programme.desc: A aventura começa em Lanzarote, no espetacular Charco de la Novia, onde uma prova aquática individual emocionante determinará a formação de duas equipas de 4 concorrentes: a equipa azul e a equipa amarela. Para além disso, a prova dará ao vencedor um privilégio que terá de exercer no final do capítulo: trocar um dos membros da sua equipa por um membro da equipa adversária. Contudo, antes disso, as duas equipas irão enfrentar-se em duras provas nos Jameos del Agua, no Charco de San Ginés e no Castillo de San Gabriel, onde entrará também em jogo o Talismã de Magec, que dará imunidade a um dos membros da equipa vencedora.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: Carolina Morace, em Roma, revela-se uma mulher de caráter forte, sem medo de se assumir como pioneira em qualquer domínio, como quando se torna na primeira mulher a marcar quatro golos no estádio de Wembley. Barbara Bonansea, jogadora da Juventus escolhida para a Seleção Mundial da FIFA/FIFPro de 2020, está com a sua família, incluindo a avó, que a apoiou no seu desejo de se tornar futebolista. Benedetta Orsi, jogadora noviça do US Sassuolo, fala com otimismo sobre o modo como ultrapassou a doença que a forçou a desistir do ténis mas lhe deu a oportunidade de desenvolver a sua paixão pelo futebol.

programme.title: In The Turn
programme.desc: “In The Turn”. Always forward and never straight. At the age of three, Crystal said that she was a girl despite being born in a boy's body. Ever since her mother bought her a skirt shortly after, a difficult journey began for Crystal, whose transition has since suffered all kinds of harassment that at the age of five led her to consider taking her own life. The discovery of "Vagine Regime", a queer collective of Roller Derby, becomes Crystal's great hope to be able to play in a team of girls, an opportunity that was always denied in her school.

programme.title: I Am Breathing
programme.desc: Num ano, Neil Platt deixa de ser um homem saudável para ficar completamente paralisado do pescoço para baixo, devido à doença devastadora que herdou.

programme.title: The Australian Dream (2019)
programme.desc: O Australian Dream é um documentário que utiliza a notável e inspiradora história do legendário aborígene da AFL Adam Goodes como o prisma para contar uma história mais profunda e poderosa sobre raça, identidade e pertença. O filme irá descompactar os eventos das temporadas da AFL 2013-15 e fará perguntas fundamentais sobre a natureza do racismo e da discriminação na sociedade atual. O escritor premiado de Walkley, Stan Grant, e o premiado diretor do BAFTA, Daniel Gordon, unem forças para contar essa história notável de um dos jogadores mais condecorados e célebres da história da AFL.

programme.title: The Peddler
programme.desc: Daniel Burmeister, um cinéfilo de barbas, viaja de terra em terra a realizar filmes de muito baixo orçamento com os autóctones, e em tempo recorde!

programme.title: Discovering Canary Islands - Episódio 3-4
programme.desc: Episódio 3 - Gran Canaria | Episódio 4 - Tenerife

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. Ao mesmo tempo, Ona embarcou num plano ambicioso para competir nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio. O documentário acompanha Ona durante estes 11 meses intensos, em que terá de forçar os seus limites a um grau extraordinário, tanto física como emocionalmente. Acompanhamos Ona de perto, partilhando as suas rotinas e desafios diários, desde a amamentação aos momentos de brincadeira com o bebé Kai, passando pelas sessões de treino intenso com a Seleção Nacional Espanhola.

programme.title: Break Through
programme.desc: Uma peça encenada por estudantes de teatro torna-se num espetáculo subversivo em prol dos direitos LGBT.

programme.title: Daughters of the Sexual Revolution: The Untold Story of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Assinado pelo realizador nomeado para um óscar Dana Adam Shapiro, este filme intrépido apresenta-nos a história do sucesso repentino das Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders como uma metáfora para o clímax da revolução sexual dos EUA.

programme.title: Fast Forward - Episode 1 - 5
programme.desc: Fusão Nuclear | Corpos Biónicos | Limpadores do Espaço | Carne Criada em Laboratório | Blockchain, protocolo da confiança

programme.title: Give Up Tomorrow
programme.desc: Nas Filipinas, um homem inocente enfrenta a pena de morte num polêmico caso de assassinato que separou duas famílias e uma nação inteira.

programme.title: Make Up Stars - T1: Natureza - E o vencedor é...
programme.desc: Na semifinal, os concorrentes enfrentarão um desafio de pintura corporal em que terão de representar um dos quatro elementos naturais, sob a orientação de Corinne Pérez. Contarão com a assistência dos antigos concorrentes e receberão a visita de umas das mais influentes maquilhadoras das redes sociais e uma verdadeira especialista em pintura corporal: Nuria Adraos. A jovem artista dará conselhos aos concorrentes, enquanto estes lutam por um lugar na final.

programme.title: HairStyle, The Talent Show -Episódios 3 - 4
programme.desc: O primeiro desafio é criar um visual na mais importante das circunstâncias: o casamento. As noivas sabem exatamente aquilo que querem quando entram no salão. Irão escolher o seu cabeleireiro, com quem terão um diálogo para definir a sua visão. Num desafio como este, falhar está fora de questão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá visitar o salão e partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares. Em seguida, os participantes irão trabalhar nos cuidados capilares, restaurando o cabelo danificado dos clientes do salão. A celebridade televisiva e influencer de moda Paige DeSorbo irá partilhar algumas das suas dicas infalíveis de cuidados capilares.

programme.title: We All Play
programme.desc: “WE ALL PLAY” é um projeto que explora a realidade da comunidade LGBTQIA+ no mundo do desporto. Através de uma viagem à volta do mundo, este documentário inspirador apresenta-nos atletas de elite extraordinários que, muitas vezes pela primeira vez, partilham as suas experiências pessoais e profissionais. Os seus testemunhos revelam visões diferentes e opiniões profundas sobre os triunfos e os desafios diários enfrentados por estes atletas. Dando ênfase à importância da inclusão e da aceitação, o documentário evidencia como o desporto pode constituir um espaço para a diversidade e o respeito, promovendo uma mudança positiva em todas as áreas do desporto e para além dele.

programme.title: Episódios 5-6
programme.desc: Match Point | Noite Europeia

programme.title: Karate-do: O Caminho de Sandra Sánchez
programme.desc: Não é um dragão, mas parece no dojo. Eis Sandra Sánchez, uma das maiores figuras do karate de sempre. Esta é a história do seu percurso único. Dos seus feitos. Uma história complicada que inclui a prática do karate em criança, uma relação abusiva na vida adulta e um penúltimo ano de carreira inacreditável onde que bateu recordes ao competir nos três mais prestigiosos campeonatos de karate – e vencê-los. O caminho até ao sucesso nunca é fácil, mas nos Jogos Olímpicos de Tóquio, Sandra lutou por e contra muitas dificuldades para conquistar um lugar nos anais da história.

programme.title: Campeãs
programme.desc: A família Flores toma o pequeno-almoço, o almoço e o jantar a pensar em futebol. As jovens irmãs Tatiana e Silvana treinam com o seu pai, um ex-jogador mexicano, e recebem dele toda a experiência de que precisam para a sua carreira. Kelly Smith, uma genuína lenda do futebol e a maior marcadora na história da seleção nacional feminina inglesa, espera por elas em sua casa. Antes de se encontrar com as irmãs Flores, partilha com as câmaras do programa os momentos mais duros da sua carreira. Entretanto, Lucy Bronze (Manchester City FC), Melhor Jogadora do Ano de 2020 da FIFA, recorda a sua carreira e partilha algumas afirmações surpreendentes.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: Uma família filmada por dentro. O realizador regista a luta contra o cancro da sua mãe, o anúncio de gravidez da sua irmã e as obras de renovação da sala de estar dirigidas pelo seu pai.

programme.title: Anything is Possible
programme.desc: Serge Ibaka cresceu pobre e às vezes desabrigado nas ruas de Brazzaville. A sua mãe morreu quando Serge tinha 7 anos e, aos seus 12 anos, o seu pai foi à prisão. Apesar desses obstáculos esmagadores, alcançou o seu sonho de tornar-se um campeão da NBA. Este documentário acompanha a Serge na sua viagem de volta para a República do Congo, para mostrar o troféu do campeonato da NBA, mas mais importante, partilha uma mensagem de que, através de muito trabalho e determinação, "Anything is Possible"!

programme.title: Ona Carbonell: Começar de novo
programme.desc: Em agosto de 2020, a nadadora artística olímpica Ona Carbonell tornou-se mãe, uma experiência que mudou de imediato a sua vida. programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Vegetarians walk amongst us, and Rob gets challenged by his veggie loving friend to grill up a meatless BBQ. Rob steps up to the grill and demonstrates that he can grill it all! Bbqed stuffed cabbage rolls, roasted veggie cal zone, maple butter spiced squash and spinach cherry salad.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Trentino-Alto Adige

programme.title: The Urban Vegetarian
programme.desc: Lettuce Eat Lasagna

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: "A" is on the menu and Chef Robert Jewell takes on this meal challenge with apricots and avocados. First up, Robert cooks a spicy roasted quail and drizzles it with some sweet apricot and calvados sauce. Next, is a meal best served cold! Robert slices up sushi-grade tuna and transforms it into a flavourful tartare, brought to life by rich avocado and refreshing lime. On the side, he adds crusty crostini with savoury soy sauce and sesame oil, the perfect complement for this meltin- your-mouth meal. For his final dish, Robert combines apricots and avocados for an unbelievably tasty dish.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Host Theresa Visintin picks the letter “D” in this challenge and combines two very different ingredients – dill and duck! But that’s no big dill for Theresa. For her first dish, Theresa uses dill seeds and weed to make a hearty, creamy dill pickle soup. She adds chicken broth and potatoes as her base but makes the soup extra smooth with some sour cream. She tops the soup with dill pickles to add a delightful crunch. Next, Theresa takes duck, a classic French ingredient, and gives it a French Canadian twist – duck tourtière. Using the duck fat to fry up some veggies, she adds red wine to her chicken stock and simmers the meat. Then, Theresa fills a pie crust with this delightful duck...

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: The cost of having a party every weekend is adding up so Rob decides to throw a Vegas Night BBQ. With a menu of apple stuffed veal roast, rosemary pork, grilled summer beets and a fresh green salad - his guests are sure to bet big and hit the tables with style.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt Dunigan hits the soccer field at a local youth soccer tournament. After some fancy footwork he leaves the field and hits the grill to cook up some Slo-Smoked Saucy Ribs, some Cheesy Bacon Potato Skins, and Chicken on a stick with Home Made Plum Sauce

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Country Fair

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser that's easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Looking sexy in his grass skirt, Rob and his fish monger friend Jim Foster hang up their surf boards and throw a great Hawaiian Luau. They prepare a feast including kaluah pork, cowabunga shrimp and some freshly grilled fennel and orange salad. It's a tropical feast.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Mardi Gras Party

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Not only do the racers in the Soap Box Derby have a need for speed, they have a need for BBQ! Matt and the RG team cook up a feast to slow down any speedster. The menu: Smoked Shrimp B.L.T., Pineapple Basil Rotisserie Chicken, Grilled Sweet Potato Pops, and Summer Berry Pudding.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Day By the Water
programme.desc: Matt spends the day by the water; fishing, playing Frisbee, catching some rays. What goes with water and sun? BBQ!!! Matt & his team make a seafood buffet of Grilled Clams in the Shell with Serrano Ham, Smoked Lake Rainbow Trout, Grilled Lobster with Grapefruit Salsa, and Crab-Stuffed Avocados.

programme.title: Licence to Grill
programme.desc: The Martini Birthday

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: The cost of having a party every weekend is adding up so Rob decides to throw a Vegas Night BBQ. With a menu of apple stuffed veal roast, rosemary pork, grilled summer beets and a fresh green salad - his guests are sure to bet big and hit the tables with style.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt Dunigan hits the soccer field at a local youth soccer tournament. After some fancy footwork he leaves the field and hits the grill to cook up some Slo-Smoked Saucy Ribs, some Cheesy Bacon Potato Skins, and Chicken on a stick with Home Made Plum Sauce

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: The Country Fair

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Fun and quirky host Chef Spencer Watts kicks off this episode by showing off his knife skills as he sabres a pineapple to start his instant classic; Grilled Fruit Salad. The pineapple joins a mix of bright summer fruits on the grill, then berries, spicy citrus vinaigrette and savoury feta cheese. Next up, Spencer whips up his Hawaiian Chicken recipe. Spiced with cayenne and Chinese five spice, Spencer stuffs flavourful chicken thighs with pineapple and grills it with a delightful ginger and soy sauce. Every bite is sweet, savoury, and fresh - exactly how summer should taste! Then Spencer shares his top tips for adding smoky flavours to pork using an easy and handy smoke pouch. His Apple...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Allium in the Family
programme.desc: Onions, green onions, chives, garlic, and leeks are all members of the same fabulous flowering family, Allium! First up? Chef Watts shows us his sweet and smoky Charred Leeks with Romesco; add grilled toast and you have your next party appetizer! Next up is a main course. Spencer starts with a juicy grilled pork chop, then adds roasted garlic melted into a balsamic onion chutney to make his out-of-this-world Roasted Garlic Pork Chops. Looking for a crowd pleaser that's easy to make? Spencer has a recipe for that! Chicken Yakitori. He threads skewers with crunchy green onions and tender chicken and caramelizes the yakitori sauce as he grills this tasty dish. Are you ready to drool? Spencer...

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Looking sexy in his grass skirt, Rob and his fish monger friend Jim Foster hang up their surf boards and throw a great Hawaiian Luau. They prepare a feast including kaluah pork, cowabunga shrimp and some freshly grilled fennel and orange salad. It's a tropical feast.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Mardi Gras Party

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Not only do the racers in the Soap Box Derby have a need for speed, they have a need for BBQ! Matt and the RG team cook up a feast to slow down any speedster. The menu: Smoked Shrimp B.L.T., Pineapple Basil Rotisserie Chicken, Grilled Sweet Potato Pops, and Summer Berry Pudding.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Day By the Water
programme.desc: Matt spends the day by the water; fishing, playing Frisbee, catching some rays. What goes with water and sun? BBQ!!! Matt & his team make a seafood buffet of Grilled Clams in the Shell with Serrano Ham, Smoked Lake Rainbow Trout, Grilled Lobster with Grapefruit Salsa, and Crab-Stuffed Avocados.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Rob reluctantly agrees to throw a Pajama Party BBQ for his friend after they save him some big cash on his taxes. The tea-smoked chicken with an apple-plum chutney, grilled swordfish with a chili coconut crust and roasted veggie stuffed tomatoes send his friends off with sweet dreams of BBQ heaven.

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Beach Party

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Ball Hockey

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: Have a cheese lover coming over? Blow their minds with some of Spencer's "grate" barbecued cheese recipes! First up, Spencer chars Brie Cheese to an ooey-gooey perfection and tops it with tart cherries and crunchy walnuts, serving it with crispy grilled crostinis. Next up is a Grilled Steak and Caesar with a twist only Spencer could add - grilled... lettuce! Then, Spencer uses the classic German "hasselback" presentation to stuff chicken breasts with verdant spinach, yummy Swiss cheese and pungent sun- dried tomatoes, grilling them to melty perfection. Finally, Spencer fires up his barbecue to make his Grilled Peaches with Salted Bourbon Caramel, a decadent dessert elevated with creamy...

programme.title: Watts On the Grill
programme.desc: In this bacon loving episode, Chef Spencer delivers a tasty Bacon Weave Turkey Breast, which gets injected with beer and spices before being wrapped up in its cozy bacon blanket and sent off to the grill! Next up? A Peameal Bacon Roast with Rosti. This heavy hunk of back bacon gets smoked to flavourful perfection while Chef Watts makes the crispiest golden-fried-to-perfection potato pancake. Then, Spencer whips up a charry, grilled, super decadent, bacon-wrapped and bacon stuffed cheeseburger. Spencer isn't finished with bacon yet! For his final recipe, Spencer stuffs an apple with decadent crispy morsels stuffed along with savoury caramelized onions and melty cheddar cheese.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Men love beer. Men love fire. Men love to eat. Put it all together and you get a backyard full of men feasting off of a beer inspired barbecued meal including roasted chicken on a beer can, beer wings, beer burgers and even a beer dressing for potato salad.

programme.title: License to Grill
programme.desc: Airband Concert Pre-Party

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Matt gets down and dirty playing some beach Volleyball. In between bumps, sets, and spikes, the RG team serves up a smorgasbord of great food. The menu: Grilled Chicken Breast on Foccacia with Grilled Apples & Cambozola Cheese, Sezchuan Ribs with Chunky Plum Dipping Sauce, Roasted Corn and Pepper Potato Salad, and Homemade Protein Bars

programme.title: Road Grill
programme.desc: Forget bicycle built for two. This Big Bike fits 30 people! Matt & the team join forces with the Heart & Stroke foundation to raise money by riding around a track. Matt feeds these 'bikers' some healthy and delicious grub. The menu: Grilled Calamari, Smoked Turkey Fajitas, Grilled Scallops and Watermelon Salsa, and Cold Gazpacho.

programme.title: Licence to Grill
programme.desc: Rob's friends haven't been out since the birth of their first child six weeks ago. In celebration of their first night out, Rob goes all out with a shellfish fiesta. Grilled clams with lemon butter sauce, Caribbean rum shrimp, great scallop brochettes and more are on the menu.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: After picking the letter "L," Chef Robert Jewell takes on lamb and licorice in this ingredient challenge. He starts with aromatic Moroccan lamb riblets, an appetizer that will make you want this spicy dish as your main course too. Next, Robert takes it up a notch by showing us how to make licorice - yes, the candy! He brings coconut oil, brown sugar, creamed coconut, and molasses to boil before skillfully adding flour and anise to make sweet, chewy coconut licorice. Finally, Robert concocts the perfect recipe that combines succulent lamb with sweet licorice.

programme.title: A is for Apple
programme.desc: Host Theresa Visintin creates savoury meals in this letter "R" challenge featuring radicchios and raisins. First, Theresa chops up bold and bitter radicchios, grilling them until the edges are a crispy golden brown and perfect for a warm wedge salad. Then, she tosses fried pancetta and earthy portobello mushrooms in a luxurious champagne vinegar and pours it over the crispy radicchio. Theresa tops this warm salad with creamy crumbled goat's cheese. For her next dish, Theresa prepares a rum raisin sauce using golden sultana raisins, dark rum, and fresh orange. Theresa pours the sauce over succulent ham. Is your mouth watering yet? Finally, Theresa combines radicchio and raisin into a...

programme.title: Detroit Muscle
programme.desc: This hissing Cobra gets dialed in with final touches, taking it from concept to coiled and ready to strike! Strap in for Project Sydewinder's first track day!

programme.title: Engine Power
programme.desc: After some super dyno pulls on our supercharged 383, Mike and Pat try to bring back an old Ford 390 FE from the dead! What will it take to go from the junkyard to the dyno?

programme.title: Truck Tech
programme.desc: Judgement day for our Ram dually on both the dyno and dragstrip.

programme.title: Music City Trucks
programme.desc: We upgrade the brakes, repair underside problems, and put some great new off-road and recovery mods on our 2007 Jeep Wrangler JK. Then we'll take it out for a wheeling adventure.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Backpack Labuan Bajo & Bali, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah's tryst with Komodo dragons continues as she visits the Komodo island. Exploring its beaches, she ends her day after snorkelling at the Pink beach. Further exploring Labuan Bajo she visits the Mello village to witness the cultural Caci dance and learn about the Manggarai Culture.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Hannah in her final leg of her backpacking journey in Indonesia, explores the island’s beautiful temples and wraps up her day with a traditional dinner. Next morning she visits the turtle island where learns about its conservation and tries parasailing. Her trip concludes with an unforgettable experience of undersea walking.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Moroccan Chronicles Chefchaouen
programme.desc: Rafe visits Chefchaouen and is instantly besotted with the city, much to the confusion of the locals who are baffled by his eccentricities.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: In April 1912, the RMS Titanic set sail on her maiden voyage to New York City and tragically sank in the North Atlantic Ocean after hitting an iceberg. Over 100 years later, the proud people of Belfast continue to honor the memory of their “Queen of the Ocean” through their fantastic exhibition, the Titanic Belfast. Olivia visits this unmissable multimedia extravaganza that makes the story of the world’s most famous ocean liner come alive for her.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 2, Maldives
programme.desc: The warm, cerulean waters of Maldives are home to an endless variety of exotic marine life and colourful coral reefs. During Kim’s visit, she tries out diving and finds herself transported to another world altogether, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur. A chance to feed sting rays adds to the magic of her experiences at this tropical utopia.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Kissed By The Sea Valletta, Malta
programme.desc: Tara explores Valletta and Vittoriosa town, visiting historical monuments, Barraka Garden, Grand Harbour and learning about Catholic influence on Malta.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Apart from being a tropical paradise with turquoise waters, coral reefs and white sandy beaches, Mauritius is home to many natural wonders. During Freishia’s visit, she is spellbound by the magnificent Chamarel Falls, which is the highest waterfall of the island, and the surreal psychedelic dunes known as the seven coloured earth of Chamarel.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Moroccan Chronicles Fes
programme.desc: The imperial city of Fes, with its richly evocative attractions, makes Rafe feel like he is in a movie...with a plot twist right around the corner.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 World Heritage Norway's Heritage Sites
programme.desc: Be it stave churches, Viking villages or dramatic fjords, Norway’s marvelous heritage reveals its rich history.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Freishia catches the adventure bug on her trip to Mauritius, which leads her to go kite surfing at the gorgeous Le Morne beach. Hungry for more, she goes to Casela Park, a nature reserve where she takes a walk with the big cats of the jungle. An exhilarating zip-line ride through the St. Felix sugar estate makes her realize that these adventures don’t just offer an adrenaline rush but also an exciting new way to appreciate the beauty of Mauritius.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Kissed By The Sea Comino, Malta
programme.desc: Tara visits the Comino island and explores the rugged landscapes of Mdina. Later, she learns about locals in Marsaxlokk and enjoys her time at Popeye Village.

programme.title: World Spas
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 World Spas Kumarakom Lake
programme.desc: Located on the tranquil banks of Vembanad Lake, Kumarakom Lake Resort is enveloped by nature and recognized as one of the best luxury resorts.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 The Moroccan Chronicles Casablanca
programme.desc: At Casablanca, Rafe draws hilarious connections between what he sees, and the 1942 Hollywood classic named after the city.

programme.title: Mr and Mrs Roy in AlUla
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mr and Mrs Roy in AlUla
programme.desc: Rohit and Manasi take a romantic trip to AlUla, where they are drawn to traditional Arab hospitality and the mysteries of an ancient kingdom.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Moroccan Chronicles Marrakech
programme.desc: The evocative city of Marrakech has long provided great artists with inspiration, but will it be able to give Rafe the adventure he seeks?

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kissed By The Sea Gozo Island, Malta
programme.desc: At Gozo island, Tara tries scuba-diving, visits Calypso Caves, explores the rugged landscape of Gozo and finally visits the Ta'Pinnu shrine.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Pristine beaches, coral reefs and indigenous forests, which are home to rare wildlife – nature truly takes center stage in Mauritius. Freishia’s explorations of this natural wonderland of a country lead her to a nature reserve, which was once used for growing vanilla, but is now a breeding park for Nile river crocodiles.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Viajar Mexico El Tule
programme.desc: Charlie shows the best ways to navigate the vibrant culinary scene of Mexico’s gastronomic capital, Oaxaca.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 City Breaks Frankfurt, Germany
programme.desc: Christina is in Frankfurt and receives light shower rains.She decides to beat the rains and head out to one of the smaller towns.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Backpack Jakarta & JogJakarta, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah begins her backpacking journey in Indonesia from its capital, Jakarta. Understanding the country’s colonial past, she visits Taman Fatahillah and then Sunda Kelapa harbour. Jog Jakarta, popular for the Borobudur temple is her next stop where she also visits the Batik embroidery factory, ending with a joyride on a bling-bling car and visit to Malioboro street.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Pubs in Ireland are much more than a place to drink; they’re an institution. They are social hotspots, centers of cultural gatherings and Irish ‘craic’. Olivia visits the country’s oldest pub in Dublin, the capital city, where she gets to see the love that Irish people have for storytelling. Later on, she goes to the Guinness Storehouse to find out the story behind the dark potion, which is not only the most common beer in Ireland, but also something of a national symbol.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Viajar Mexico Villa Del Carbon
programme.desc: From greenery and culture to spiritual power, Charlie reveals the things that make some of Mexico’s towns ‘Pueblo Magicos’.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Backpack Mt. Bromo & Komodo National Park, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah wraps up from Jog Jakarta after her visit to Sultan’s palace and heads to East Java’s capital, Bromo, for a thrilling experience of watching an active volcano. Keeping the adrenalin on, she visits Komodo National Park for sighting the world’s largest reptile - Komodo Dragon.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: The west coast of Ireland, once considered the end of the known world, is the most magical part of this storied island. Olivia embarks on a journey along the scenic coastal route called the Wild Atlantic Way, to explore the savage beauty of this craggy coastline with its dramatic sea cliffs, windswept beaches and bucolic hamlets. Along the way she stops at Burren, a stony moonscape of karst, where she sees the rugged Cliffs of Moher at the edge of the ceaselessly churning Atlantic.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits Manchester, the city of football and fashion, the city of heritage and hedonism, the city of the industrial revolution.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Ireland Wild Atlantic Way
programme.desc: Famed for its rugged landscapes and glistening lakes, Connemara is one of Ireland’s most romantic regions. On a trip to this rocky wilderness, Olivia visits some of its postcard-perfect castles. At the idyllic Ballynahinch Castle, she gets to experience the perfect blend of history, luxury and countryside beauty. She also finds herself deeply moved by the love story that gave rise to Kylemore Abbey, a mesmerizing castle that looks like the last page of a fairytale book.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: A trip to Maldives is like a voyage to a big blue water wonderland. A villa with a floor, which offers clear views of the turquoise ocean and exquisite marine life underfoot, enhances this experience for Kim, during her visit. She pampers herself further with an underwater spa treatment and a bottle of wine from an underground wine cellar, which is like a treasure cave for wine connoisseurs around the world.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Viajar Mexico Ciudad De Mexico
programme.desc: From the Aztec reign to the Mexican Revolution, the capital of Mexico offers a glimpse into different periods of its history.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Backpack Labuan Bajo & Bali, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah's tryst with Komodo dragons continues as she visits the Komodo island. Exploring its beaches, she ends her day after snorkelling at the Pink beach. Further exploring Labuan Bajo she visits the Mello village to witness the cultural Caci dance and learn about the Manggarai Culture.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Kissed By The Sea Valletta, Malta
programme.desc: Tara explores Valletta and Vittoriosa town, visiting historical monuments, Barraka Garden, Grand Harbour and learning about Catholic influence on Malta.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Moroccan Chronicles Fes
programme.desc: The imperial city of Fes, with its richly evocative attractions, makes Rafe feel like he is in a movie...with a plot twist right around the corner.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Apart from being a tropical paradise with turquoise waters, coral reefs and white sandy beaches, Mauritius is home to many natural wonders. During Freishia’s visit, she is spellbound by the magnificent Chamarel Falls, which is the highest waterfall of the island, and the surreal psychedelic dunes known as the seven coloured earth of Chamarel.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Moroccan Chronicles Chefchaouen
programme.desc: Rafe visits Chefchaouen and is instantly besotted with the city, much to the confusion of the locals who are baffled by his eccentricities.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: In April 1912, the RMS Titanic set sail on her maiden voyage to New York City and tragically sank in the North Atlantic Ocean after hitting an iceberg. Over 100 years later, the proud people of Belfast continue to honor the memory of their “Queen of the Ocean” through their fantastic exhibition, the Titanic Belfast. Olivia visits this unmissable multimedia extravaganza that makes the story of the world’s most famous ocean liner come alive for her.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 2, Maldives
programme.desc: The warm, cerulean waters of Maldives are home to an endless variety of exotic marine life and colourful coral reefs. During Kim’s visit, she tries out diving and finds herself transported to another world altogether, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur. A chance to feed sting rays adds to the magic of her experiences at this tropical utopia.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Hannah in her final leg of her backpacking journey in Indonesia, explores the island’s beautiful temples and wraps up her day with a traditional dinner. Next morning she visits the turtle island where learns about its conservation and tries parasailing. Her trip concludes with an unforgettable experience of undersea walking.

programme.desc: Tara visits the Comino island and explores the rugged landscapes of Mdina. Later, she learns about locals in Marsaxlokk and enjoys her time at Popeye Village.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Freishia catches the adventure bug on her trip to Mauritius, which leads her to go kite surfing at the gorgeous Le Morne beach. Hungry for more, she goes to Casela Park, a nature reserve where she takes a walk with the big cats of the jungle. An exhilarating zip-line ride through the St. Felix sugar estate makes her realize that these adventures don’t just offer an adrenaline rush but also an exciting new way to appreciate the beauty of Mauritius.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Moroccan Chronicles Marrakech
programme.desc: The evocative city of Marrakech has long provided great artists with inspiration, but will it be able to give Rafe the adventure he seeks?

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Pristine beaches, coral reefs and indigenous forests, which are home to rare wildlife – nature truly takes center stage in Mauritius. Freishia’s explorations of this natural wonderland of a country lead her to a nature reserve, which was once used for growing vanilla, but is now a breeding park for Nile river crocodiles.

programme.title: Mr and Mrs Roy in AlUla
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Mr and Mrs Roy in AlUla
programme.desc: Rohit and Manasi take a romantic trip to AlUla, where they are drawn to traditional Arab hospitality and the mysteries of an ancient kingdom.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Kissed By The Sea Gozo Island, Malta
programme.desc: At Gozo island, Tara tries scuba-diving, visits Calypso Caves, explores the rugged landscape of Gozo and finally visits the Ta'Pinnu shrine.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Viajar Mexico El Tule
programme.desc: Charlie shows the best ways to navigate the vibrant culinary scene of Mexico’s gastronomic capital, Oaxaca.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: Pubs in Ireland are much more than a place to drink; they’re an institution. They are social hotspots, centers of cultural gatherings and Irish ‘craic’. Olivia visits the country’s oldest pub in Dublin, the capital city, where she gets to see the love that Irish people have for storytelling. Later on, she goes to the Guinness Storehouse to find out the story behind the dark potion, which is not only the most common beer in Ireland, but also something of a national symbol.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 City Breaks Frankfurt, Germany
programme.desc: Christina is in Frankfurt and receives light shower rains.She decides to beat the rains and head out to one of the smaller towns.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Backpack Jakarta & JogJakarta, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah begins her backpacking journey in Indonesia from its capital, Jakarta. Understanding the country’s colonial past, she visits Taman Fatahillah and then Sunda Kelapa harbour. Jog Jakarta, popular for the Borobudur temple is her next stop where she also visits the Batik embroidery factory, ending with a joyride on a bling-bling car and visit to Malioboro street.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Backpack Mt. Bromo & Komodo National Park, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah wraps up from Jog Jakarta after her visit to Sultan’s palace and heads to East Java’s capital, Bromo, for a thrilling experience of watching an active volcano. Keeping the adrenalin on, she visits Komodo National Park for sighting the world’s largest reptile - Komodo Dragon.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Viajar Mexico Villa Del Carbon
programme.desc: From greenery and culture to spiritual power, Charlie reveals the things that make some of Mexico’s towns ‘Pueblo Magicos’.

programme.title: City Breaks
programme.desc: Sabrina Chakici visits Manchester, the city of football and fashion, the city of heritage and hedonism, the city of the industrial revolution.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: The west coast of Ireland, once considered the end of the known world, is the most magical part of this storied island. Olivia embarks on a journey along the scenic coastal route called the Wild Atlantic Way, to explore the savage beauty of this craggy coastline with its dramatic sea cliffs, windswept beaches and bucolic hamlets. Along the way she stops at Burren, a stony moonscape of karst, where she sees the rugged Cliffs of Moher at the edge of the ceaselessly churning Atlantic.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 1, Maldives
programme.desc: A trip to Maldives is like a voyage to a big blue water wonderland. A villa with a floor, which offers clear views of the turquoise ocean and exquisite marine life underfoot, enhances this experience for Kim, during her visit. She pampers herself further with an underwater spa treatment and a bottle of wine from an underground wine cellar, which is like a treasure cave for wine connoisseurs around the world.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Xplore Ireland Wild Atlantic Way
programme.desc: Famed for its rugged landscapes and glistening lakes, Connemara is one of Ireland’s most romantic regions. On a trip to this rocky wilderness, Olivia visits some of its postcard-perfect castles. At the idyllic Ballynahinch Castle, she gets to experience the perfect blend of history, luxury and countryside beauty. She also finds herself deeply moved by the love story that gave rise to Kylemore Abbey, a mesmerizing castle that looks like the last page of a fairytale book.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Backpack Labuan Bajo & Bali, Indonesia
programme.desc: Hannah's tryst with Komodo dragons continues as she visits the Komodo island. Exploring its beaches, she ends her day after snorkelling at the Pink beach. Further exploring Labuan Bajo she visits the Mello village to witness the cultural Caci dance and learn about the Manggarai Culture.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Viajar Mexico Ciudad De Mexico
programme.desc: From the Aztec reign to the Mexican Revolution, the capital of Mexico offers a glimpse into different periods of its history.

programme.title: Xplore Ireland
programme.desc: In April 1912, the RMS Titanic set sail on her maiden voyage to New York City and tragically sank in the North Atlantic Ocean after hitting an iceberg. Over 100 years later, the proud people of Belfast continue to honor the memory of their “Queen of the Ocean” through their fantastic exhibition, the Titanic Belfast. Olivia visits this unmissable multimedia extravaganza that makes the story of the world’s most famous ocean liner come alive for her.

programme.title: Great World Hotels
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Great World Hotels Huvafen Fushi 2, Maldives
programme.desc: The warm, cerulean waters of Maldives are home to an endless variety of exotic marine life and colourful coral reefs. During Kim’s visit, she tries out diving and finds herself transported to another world altogether, where the lines between fantasy and reality begin to blur. A chance to feed sting rays adds to the magic of her experiences at this tropical utopia.

programme.title: Backpack
programme.desc: Hannah in her final leg of her backpacking journey in Indonesia, explores the island’s beautiful temples and wraps up her day with a traditional dinner. Next morning she visits the turtle island where learns about its conservation and tries parasailing. Her trip concludes with an unforgettable experience of undersea walking.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 The Moroccan Chronicles Chefchaouen
programme.desc: Rafe visits Chefchaouen and is instantly besotted with the city, much to the confusion of the locals who are baffled by his eccentricities.

programme.title: The Moroccan Chronicles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 The Moroccan Chronicles Fes
programme.desc: The imperial city of Fes, with its richly evocative attractions, makes Rafe feel like he is in a movie...with a plot twist right around the corner.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 World Heritage Norway's Heritage Sites
programme.desc: Be it stave churches, Viking villages or dramatic fjords, Norway’s marvelous heritage reveals its rich history.

programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.desc: Apart from being a tropical paradise with turquoise waters, coral reefs and white sandy beaches, Mauritius is home to many natural wonders. During Freishia’s visit, she is spellbound by the magnificent Chamarel Falls, which is the highest waterfall of the island, and the surreal psychedelic dunes known as the seven coloured earth of Chamarel.

programme.title: Kissed By The Sea
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Kissed By The Sea Valletta, Malta
programme.desc: Tara explores Valletta and Vittoriosa town, visiting historical monuments, Barraka Garden, Grand Harbour and learning about Catholic influence on Malta.

programme.title: Why the Mercedes CLRs kept taking off at Le Mans 1999
programme.desc: Mercedes' most recent appearance in the Le Mans 24 Hours will forever be famous for the sight of its cars taking to the air. 20 years on from the 1999 event, which Mercedes eventually withdrew from following its third airborne accident of the week, Chain Bear explains in great detail the factors behind the design of the spectacular-looking CLR that were ultimately the three-pointed star's downfall

programme.title: FIA Karting World Championships (OK/OKJ)
programme.desc: After three consecutive Finals in wet conditions between 2019 and 2021, the Mondokart.com FIA Karting World Champion-ship - OK & OK-Junior saw good weather and high temperatures for the season over the weekend.

programme.title: V8 Superboats Championship Round 1
programme.desc: Today we ask you to put on your seatbelts and join us for the saison opener of the Penrite Australian V8 Superboats Championship 2022 in Cabarita, Australia.

programme.title: Engadinsnow - Silvaplana (SUI)
programme.desc: ENGADINSNOW is one of the longest-running freeride competitions in the Alps. Apart from its long tradition, this event classic has always been all about innovation.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - Best Of Season 2020 - Worldwide
programme.desc: Over the last decade the Freeride World Tour has established itself as the world's most prestigious big mountain skiing and snowboarding competition.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Freeride World Tour 2022 "Live Summary"
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 4th stop. This takes place in Austria at Fieberbrunn, (AUT). It is exciting to see what the first stop of the final has to offer after the spectacular three qualifying stages!

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA - Best of Big Air Kite World Championships
programme.desc: Welcome to the Qatar Airways GKA Bite Big Air World Tour! This thrilling season takes us to two breathtaking locations: the vibrant coastal town of Barcarès, France, and the stunning shores of Salinas de Tenefé in Spain. Get ready for the world's top kiteboarders!

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024
programme.desc: In this year’s 21st edition of the event, competitors from about 60 nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP) and Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: Tankwa Trek 2020 - Koue Bokkeveld (RSA)
programme.desc: The Momentum Medical Scheme Tankwa Trek presented by Biogen is truly a ride like no other.

programme.title: Behind The Nines - Sölden (AUT)
programme.desc: This is a look behind the scenes of one of the most prestigious ski and snowboard events in Europe.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour 2022 - stop #4 - Fieberbrunn (AUT)
programme.desc: The Freeride World Tour has its 4th stop. This takes place in Austria at Fieberbrunn, (AUT). It is exciting to see what the first stop of the final has to offer after the spectacular three qualifying stages!

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 4
programme.desc: Das Absa Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt ambitionierte Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus der ganzen Welt über 650 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2023 - Stage 5
programme.desc: Das Absa Cape Epic ist das weltweit bedeutendste Mountainbike-Etappenrennen. Die Route ändert sich jedes Jahr und führt ambitionierte Amateur- und Profi-Mountainbiker aus der ganzen Welt über 650 ungezähmte Kilometer durch unberührte Landschaften.

programme.title: Dream Job
programme.desc: A comedy documentary about a girl working in the ski industry who decides to become one of the stars: they go up, they go down, how difficult can it be? Needless to say, she finds out how hard it really can be.

programme.title: Reconnect One - USA
programme.desc: Sarka and Cheryl, who haven't seen each other in years, have decided to reunite and embark on a tour of their own. Having once traveled together on the contest scene for over 15 years, life led them to different corners of the West Coast of America.

programme.title: GKA World Tour Season Wrap Up
programme.desc: The Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Tour has just wrapped up a record-breaking year packed with drama and excitement. The stars of the sport pushed kiteboarding to new highs in 2023 in their single-minded quest for world titles.

programme.title: Engadin Snow
programme.desc: The ENGADINSNOW by Dakine is widely known as an extraordinary freeride event in front of a backdrop with the fascinating snowy mountain tops of the Swiss Canton of Grisons. This unique parallel freeride format pairs two riders in a team.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024
programme.desc: In this year’s 21st edition of the event, competitors from about 60 nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP) and Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: Qatar Airways GKA Freestyle Kite World Cup 2022 - Neom (KSA)
programme.desc: The second event of the GKA Freestyle World Cup season will see the world’s best freestyle kiters re-start their campaigns towards the Qatar Airways GKA Kite World Championship title that culminates in Brazil next month.

programme.title: World Rookie Tour Finals 2022
programme.desc: In today’s Episode we´ll give you the full dose of Freestyle Snowboarding and Skiing. Young talented Athletes from all over the world can demonstrate their skills during the World Rookie Tour 2022.

programme.title: New Zealand Winter Games 2022 Episode #01
programme.desc: The North Face Frontier 4* show is a kiwi freeride institution at the iconic Remarkables Ski Area in Queenstown. It runs in a weather window between Saturday 3rd and Thursday 8th September and is a big mountain freeride competition.

programme.title: Beach Wrestling World Series Finals 2022
programme.desc: Eight world champions to be crowned in fifth and final leg of the 2022 Beach Wrestling World Series in Constanta, Romania, on September 3 to 4. 120 beach wrestler from fight for this years world champion titles in different weight classes.

programme.title: Meet Connor Herson
programme.desc: Connor Herson pushes the limits of what is possible on the rock. But his latest and greatest challenge? Balancing a life climbing cutting edge ascents with his studies at Stanford.

programme.title: Biggest Peak Project V
programme.desc: 150 teams, 150 peaks around the world. Patagonia, Alaska and Pakistan are all part of the Biggest Peak Project in history. Deep in the southern Patagonian ice fields lies a spectacular, iconic chain of granite peaks, the Cerro Torre Group.

programme.title: Profile - Nadine Wallner (Freeride Ski)
programme.desc: Get to know Austrian freeride queen Nadine Wallner. In this show the 2 times Freeride World Tour Champion takes us into untouched powder terrain and gives us a very personal view on what Freeriding means to her.

programme.title: Freeride World Tour - 25 Years Xtreme Verbier - Verbier (SUI)
programme.desc: From the first event in 1996, the Verbier Xtreme has inspired a generation of skiers from around the globe to work for a chance to compete on the legendary face.

programme.title: Cape Epic 2020 - Documentary - Western Cape (RSA)
programme.desc: The 2020 Absa Cape Epic TV highlight show looks at how amateurs and professionals react to the cancellation of this year’s race due to the growing Coronavirus pandemic.

programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2024
programme.desc: In this year’s 21st edition of the event, competitors from about 60 nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP) and Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.desc: Climb

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: Trans Madeira 2024 Summer: Full Highlights
programme.desc: Trans Madeira combines the best things the island has to offer with five days of racing, starting high in the mountains and finishing down at the ocean. Get ready for 220km of riding, 30 special stages, exploring North, South, East and West in one mega week!

programme.title: Motosurf World Championship - Båstad (SWE)
programme.desc: Set against the stunning backdrop of the Swedish coastline, the world’s best motosurfers are ready to go head-to-head. Speed, skill, and pure passion - these are the ingredients for thrilling races on the water. Who will claim the title here in Båstad?

programme.title: SSL Gold Cup
programme.desc: Final Series 2023 - World Class Sailing - SSL Gold Cup 2023Der SSL Gold Cup ist eine spannende Ausscheidungsserie und wird auf den Kanarischen Inseln ausgetragen. Die 24 besten Nationen der SSL-Rangliste und 16 Nationen aus der Qualifikationsserie nehmen daran teil.

programme.title: Reconnect Two - USA
programme.desc: Today we continue our North American Odyssey with Sarka Pancochova and Cheryl Maas in Reconnect Two. From Mt Baker and the legendary Bank Slalom to backcountry kickers in Bend get ready for the full Pacific Northwest snowboard experience.

programme.title: Mediterranean Epic
programme.desc: The Mediterranean Epic offers an UCI 4 stage race where mountain bikers enjoy mountain biking to the fullest during the route around Oropesa del Mar - Castellón (Spain).

programme.title: Gorges de l’Ardèche Kayaking Marathon & Sainté Lyon
programme.desc: Join us in France for the 39th Gorges de l’Ardèche International Marathon in the stunning Ardèche gorge, followed by the legendary SaintéLyon night run in Lyon and Saint-Étienne, now in its 69th edition and attracting up to 20,000 participants annually!

programme.title: GKA & GWA - Best Of World Cup Cape Verde
programme.desc: Cape Verde is blessed with a moderate climate, north-easterly trade winds and warm ocean swells that break on the islands' reefs, making it a paradise for Kite-Surfing and wingfoiling. Sal island in particular boasts one of the world's greatest right-hand point-breaks.

programme.title: Beni SpeedTransalp
programme.desc: Für die Strecke von Ruhpolding (GER) nach Kasern (ITA), 210 Kilometer und mehr als 10000 Höhenmeter, benötigen Freizeitsportler etwa fünf bis sieben Tage. Benedikt Böhm strebt die magische Zeitgrenze von 36 Stunden nonstop an.

programme.title: The Art of Canyoning
programme.desc: The Art of Canyoning führt dem TV-Publikum diese junge Sportart vor. Spannung, Action, Natur und sportliches Können stehen auf dem Programm, wenn fünf der weltbesten Canyoning-Profis einige der schönsten Orte im Schweizer Kanton Tessin bezwingen.

programme.title: Mystic Skate Cup 2024
programme.desc: At the end of June, the 29th annual of the legendary Mystic sk8 Cup took place in Prague – Štvanice island. In these historical records, you can see that the 30th anniversary is approaching, but already now, there was a lot to see and it was an incredible spectacle.

programme.title: Queen & King of the Court
programme.desc: For the fourth year running Hamburg will host a Queen & King of the Court tournament. From May 30 till June 2nd the best of the best will travel once again to the harbor city on the Elbe River to fight for the titles of Queens and Kings of Hamburg.

programme.title: World E-Bike Series Round #1 & #2

programme.title: Gorges de l'Ardèche
programme.desc: France is home to several geological and aquatic wonders. In autumn, the river and its gorges are the perfect setting for a competition celebrating white-water paddling. It’s the 37th edition of the International Marathon!

programme.title: X-Project 2.0
programme.desc: X-project 2.0 is a worldwide unique project where different winter sports unite in front of the backdrop of a Swiss dreamscape in the mountains of Engadin valley (Canton of Grisons).

programme.title: World Rookie Tour Finals & Mystic Sk8 Cup
programme.desc: On today´s show we´ll be city hopping. First we drop in on Innsbruck´s World Rookie Tour Skate edition and then we´ll roll on over to Prague to the legendary skate Event known worldwide as the Mystic Cup.

programme.title: Slay the Bay
programme.desc: ‘Slay The Bay’ is a urban mountain bike adventure in the San Francisco Bay area. . Hans Rey, an icon in the bike scene, on this trip accompanied by fellow Freeride pioneer Brett Tippie.

programme.title: BACK TO NORMAL
programme.desc: For Ian Mitchard jumping out of airplanes and soaring above the earth with a nylon canopy is as normal as walking through the grocery store. But when a dramatic accident put the lifestyle he loves in jeopardy, Ian is forced to grapple with his body.

programme.title: 4Islands - Croatia
programme.desc: 4Islands MTB Croatia will welcome over 370 mountain bikers from all over the world for a five-day race on four Croatian islands. This year the order of the islands will be slightly different, starting with Krk, Cres, Lošinj and ending on Rab.

programme.title: Škoda Titan Desert Series - Morocco

programme.title: World Downhill Skateboarding Championship

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: The eight-man one-night GLORY Light Heavyweight Grand Prix will crown the baddest light heavyweight striker on the planet. The eight participants are: GLORY champion, #C Tarik Khbabez (58-10-1, 28 KO), Morocco. Former champion, #1 Donegi Abena (27-10, 7 KO), Suriname. Former champion, #2 Sergej Maslobojev (38-6, 23 KO), Lithuania. Undefeated in GLORY, #3 Stefan Latescu (17-2, 8 KO), Romania. ‘Mister Cool’ #4 Ibrahim El Bouni (41-9-1, 22 KO), Morocco. The wild & unpredictable, #5 Bahram Rajabzadeh (67-2, 59 KO), Azerbaijan. Top French light heavyweight, #6 Pascal Toure (20-6, 7 KO), France. Veteran fighter, #7 Bogdan Stoica (58-14, 40 KO), Romania.

programme.title: Nothing But Bangers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Nothing But Bangers Episode 2
programme.desc: 2 hours of nothing but great knockouts and exciting fights.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: The event featured the long-awaited rematch between former champion Badr Hari and Hesdy Gerges as Glory 51 headliner. This event also featured a 4-Man Welterweight Contender Tournament to earn a shot at the Glory Welterweight Championship.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY Kickboxing’s Summer of GLORY concluded with a massive event from the Johan Cruijff Arena in Amsterdam. In the night’s headliner, heavyweight champion Rico Verhoeven took on Brazilian challenger Guto Inocente. Verhoeven had defended his belt seven straight times since capturing the title in 2014. His winning streak inside the GLORY ring stood at 16. Inocente looked to dethrone the world’s top-ranked heavyweight riding the momentum of wins over Benjamin Adegbuyi, D’Angelo Marshall and Hesdy Gerges. programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Antonio "Junior" Silva has dominated every one of his fights. Eric Pele may be the underdog, but he's riding his own winning streak. It's an earthquake when a 32-pound unstoppable force meets a 300-pound unmovable object. Roger Gracie is already at the top of the heap in Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu and submission wrestling, now he's fighting MMA for the first time. He puts his reputation on the line as he faces Ron Waterman.

Up next Sam Franchi defends his Flyweight Champion Title against challenger Sambath Khun. You do not want to miss it!
